location_details.summary: 2400 Durant Avenue Check for hours Enjoy relaxed, lounge-feeling dining with chill vibes at Café 3 dining commons, featuring two dining stations, a kosher station, and a
details: Enjoy relaxed, lounge-feeling dining with chill vibes at Café 3 dining commons, featuring two dining stations, a kosher station, and a convenience store called the

. There’s a variety of diverse foods along with favorites such as pizza, burgers, chicken sandwiches, fries, pasta, and more. Café 3 is one of the few Kosher-certified kitchens in Berkeley and also has Kosher, allergen-friendly, vegan, and vegetarian options available. The hard-working, dedicated team loves serving over 2,500 students daily.

details: As the flagship of Berkeley Dining, Crossroads dining commons has a modern vibe and is well known for great flavor profiles and international foods. Its 10 stations serve a variety of eats like pho, pizza, deli, salad bar, and more — all with close attention to food labels, allergen-free platforms, and dietary needs. Discover right next door
and Peet’s Coffee. The diverse, family-oriented team welcomes 4,400 students through its doors every day.

location_details.summary: 2700 Hearst Avenue Check for hours Renovation Updates Foothill Dining Commons is undergoing exciting renovations this fall to enhance your dining experience. While the Oak Room and
details: Foothill Dining Commons is undergoing exciting renovations this fall to enhance your dining experience. While the Oak Room and main servery are temporarily closed during construction, all dining rooms remain open with the same welcoming atmosphere.

Our culinary team continues serving through temporary cold and hot bars in the lounge space. The renovation will bring a dedicated allergen-friendly station, brand new kitchen equipment, enhanced food stations, and expanded menu offerings. This transformation is expected to be completed this fall.
